TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Choices.Token> TokenizerFunction(string text, string locale = null);
.class public auto ansi sealed TokenizerFunction extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function TokenizerFunction(text As String, Optional locale As String = null) As List(Of Token)
type TokenizerFunction = delegate of string * string -> List<Token>

Docs.param: Optional, identifies the locale of the input text.
Docs.summary: Represents a callback method that can break a string into its component tokens.
Docs.returns: The list of the found objects.
